page.title: 06CARDROSS _ HOMELIFE
page.content: {FAMILIES}HAVE CHANGED IN RECENT YEARS. THEY ARE SMALLER, MOST HAVING NOT MORE THAN TWO CHILDREN. THIS LEAVES THE WOMENFOLK WITH MORE TIME, AND MANY HAVE TAKEN A JOB OUTSIDE THE HOME. {GADGETS}ALSO CONTRIBUTE AND MANY ARE CONSIDERED NECESSITIES. NO LONGER IS MONDAY 'WASH DAY'! AUTOMATIC WASHING MACHINES, TUMBLE DRYERS AND NON-IRON MATERIALS SEE TO THAT. MANY MEN HELP WITH THE CHILDREN AND THE HOUSEWORK. {FOOD}HAS UNDERGONE A REVOLUTION, BUT MAY BE COMING FULL CYCLE. IN RECENT YEARS CONVENIENCE FOODS HAVE BEEN WIDELY USED, BUT ARE COMING UNDER SUSPICION! THE COMBINATION OF FREEZER AND MICROWAVE OVEN IS FASHIONABLE. WHOLEFOODS ARE IN DEMAND. {PETS -}CATS AND DOGS ARE POPULAR. A FEW FAMILIES HAVE PONIES. {HEATING}IS MAINLY BY GAS, ALTHOUGH THE COAL FIRE IS RE-APPEARING.
